long_description: Whether it's a day-long ride or just a quick spin through the park, these Canari Exo bike shorts offer padded comfort for your ride. Polyester/spandex blend quickly wicks away sweat for evaporation and offers excellent range of motion with good muscle support. 8-panel construction creates an anatomic fit for excellent performance and comfort. Chamois provides moisture-wicking performance and padded comfort; antimicrobial treatment combats odors. Compression grippers at leg openings help keep the Canari Exo bike shorts from riding up.
short_description: Whether it's a day-long ride or just a quick spin through the park, these Canari Exo bike shorts offer padded comfort for your ride.
